description: This table contains hospital account information from the Hospital Account (HAR) and Claim (CLM) master files. It will exclude professional billing hospital accounts created by visit filing order in non-single billing office service areas.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: ACCT_CLASS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospital account's account class.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCT_FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospital account's financial class.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: ACCT_SLFPYST_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospital account's self-pay status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Full Self-Pay Due


Review


Payment Plan


Pre-collection


Bad Debt


Prorated

columns.name: ACCT_BILLSTS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the status of the hospital account. If this is a professional billing default hospital account, this column always returns 4 (Billed).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Open


Discharged/Not Billed


Billed


Zero Balance


Bad Debt


Voided


Closed


Archived


Combined

columns.name: ACCT_ZERO_BAL_DT
columns.description: This column stores the date the hospital account went to a zero balance. This may be empty for older accounts, as Zero Balance Date (I HAR 244) had not always been available.

columns.name: ADM_DATE_TIME
columns.description: This column stores the admission date and time associated with the hospital account. The admission date and time (I HAR 400/405) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the data from the primary patient encounter for the hospital account. Depending on a hospital billing system definition setting, this will pull either the admission date and time (I EPT 18850/18851) or the arrival date and time (I EPT 10820/10815). If the arrival date and time is not available than the admission date and time will be used.

columns.name: ADM_DEPARMENT_ID
columns.description: The department of the account's admission event.

columns.name: ADM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The location of the account's admission event.

columns.name: ADM_PRIORITY
columns.description: The admission priority stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ADM_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the admitting provider stored on the hospital account.

columns.name: ATTENDING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the attending provider stored on the hospital account. See column PROV_ID in table HSP_ATND_PROV if coding has not been performed on this hospital account. Alternatively, see V_ARHB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ADDL_INFO for the calculated value for this column based on both hospital account and encounter data. This view should be used to maintain backwards compatibility with reports created before upgrading to the Summer 2009 release.

columns.name: AUTOPSY_DONE_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether an autopsy was performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the collection agency that was selected when the hospital account was sent to bad debt, sent to external agency A/R, outsourced, or pre-collected. This is cleared when the account returns from bad debt, returns from external agency A/R, or is no longer outsourced.

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bad debt bucket that was created when the hospital account was sent to bad debt.

columns.name: CODE_BLUE_YNU
columns.description:
Denotes whether the patient associated with the hospital account was code blue.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: COMBINE_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the target hospital account into which this hospital account was combined.

columns.name: COMBINE_DATE_TIME
columns.description: The date and time that this hospital account was combined with another one.

columns.name: COMBINE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who combined this hospital account with another one.

columns.name: COMPLETION_DT_TM
columns.description: The date and time when abstracting was completed for the hospital account.

columns.name: CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether coverages have been put on the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DISCH_DATE_TIME
columns.description: This column stores the discharge date and time associated with the hospital account. The discharge date and time (I HAR 425/430) are first pulled from the coding information on the hospital account. If this data is not stored on the hospital account yet, then this will pull the discharge date and time (I EPT 18855/18856) that is stored on the primary patient encounter for the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_DEPT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the discharge department on the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_DESTIN_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the discharge destination stored in the hospital account. This item is copied from the patient's ADT event record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DISCH_LOC_ID
columns.description: The discharge location stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: DISCH_TO
columns.description: A discharge destination stored in the hospital account for coding and/or abstracting purposes. This is manually entered into the hospital account.

columns.name: DRG_EXPECTED_REIMB
columns.description: This column stores the diagnosis-related group (DRG)-based expected reimbursement amount stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ER_ADMIT_DATE_TIME
columns.description: The emergency room admission date and time stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ER_DSCHG_DATE_TIME
columns.description: The emergency room discharge date and time stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: ER_PAT_STS_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The emergency room patient status stored in the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EXPIRATION_UNIT_ID
columns.description: The expiration unit stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: FINAL_DRG_ID
columns.description: The final coded DRG stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: FINAL_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: FRST_DMND_STMT_DT
columns.description: The date that the first demand statement was sent for the hospital account.

columns.name: FRST_STMT_DATE
columns.description: The date that the first statement (non-demand) was sent for the hospital account.  If you are sending informational or prorated statements this date will store the date the first informational, prorated, or full statement was sent.

columns.name: GUAR_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the street address of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the street address of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_WK_PHONE
columns.description: The work phone number of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: GUAR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code of the guarantor for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: IS_CALLED_911_YNU
columns.description:
Denotes whether 911 was called.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CODE_BLUE_YNU

columns.name: IS_INSTI_YN
columns.description:
Denotes whether the hospital account is designated as an institutional account. A hospital account is considered institutional if its guarantor is of a type designated as institutional in the system definition profile.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN

columns.name: LAST_DMND_STMT_DT
columns.description: The last date that a demand statement was sent for the hospital account.

columns.name: LAST_INTRM_BILL_DT
columns.description: The last date that interim billing was performed for the hospital account.

columns.name: MEANS_OF_ARRV_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's means of arrival stored in the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: NUM_OF_DET_BILLS
columns.description: The number of detail bills that have been sent for the hospital account.

columns.name: NUM_OF_DMND_STMTS
columns.description: The number of demand statements that have been sent for the hospital account.

columns.name: NUM_OF_STMTS_SENT
columns.description: The number of statements (non-demand) that have been sent for the hospital account.

columns.name: PAT_CITY
columns.description: The city portion of the address of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_DOB
columns.description: The date of birth of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The home phone number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_SSN
columns.description: The social security number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_WRK_PHN
columns.description: The work phone number of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: PAT_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code of the patient for the hospital account at time of discharge.

columns.name: POLICE_INVOLVD_YNU
columns.description:
Denotes whether the police were involved in the circumstances of the patient's hospital stay.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CODE_BLUE_YNU

columns.name: POST_ADM_EXP_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Denotes whether the patient expired after admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POST_OP_EXP_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
Denotes whether the patient expired after an operation.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: POST_ADM_EXP_HA_C_NAME

columns.name: PREBILL_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's prebilled bucket.

columns.name: PRIM_SVC_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The primary service stored in the hospital account for the patient's hospital stay.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PSYCH_CASE_YNU
columns.description:
Denotes whether the patient is classified as a psychiatric case.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CODE_BLUE_YNU

columns.name: REHAB_INDICATOR
columns.description: Denotes whether the patient was undergoing rehab.

columns.name: SCNDRY_SVC_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The secondary service stored in the hospital account for the patient's hospital stay.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIM_SVC_HA_C_NAME

columns.name: SELF_PAY_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account's self-pay bucket.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the service area stored on the hospital account.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ
columns.description: The total of all adjustments on the hospital account.

columns.name: TOT_CHGS
columns.description: The total of all charges on the hospital account.

columns.name: TRANSFER_FROM
columns.description: Denotes where the patient was transferred from.

columns.name: TREATMENT_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Note: This column will be deprecated in a future release. Please start referring to the column HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.AUTHORIZATION_NUM in your reports. Authorization Number: Used on claims for identifying patient referrals and affected reimbursements. Refer to CLAIM_INFO2 table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UB92_COINS_DAYS
columns.description: The number of coinsurance days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UB92_COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The number of covered days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UB92_LIFETIME_DAYS
columns.description: The number of lifetime reserve days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UB92_NONCOVRD_DAYS
columns.description: The number of noncovered days that were listed on a UB92 claim for the hospital account. This is a user-entered value that overrides the value calculated by the system. Refer to AP_CLAIM table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE
columns.description: Note: This column will be deprecated in a future release. Please start referring to the column HSP_ACCT_CLAIM_HAR.UB92_TOB_OVERRIDE in your reports. Type of Bill (TOB) override: TOB is a numeric code printed on claims that provide encounter information to a payer. Values entered here will override system settings that normally determine the Type of Bill. Refer to CLAIM_INFO2 table if not set on the hospital account.

columns.name: UNDISTRB_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for a hospital account's undistributed bucket.

columns.name: PATIENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient status (discharge disposition) category ID for the hospital account.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ER_PAT_STS_HA_C_NAME

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The point of origin category ID (admission source) for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The admission type category ID for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary payer associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the primary benefit plan associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: PRIMARY_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: NUM_OF_CHARGES
columns.description: The total number of charge transactions posted to the hospital account. This number may include inactive charges, such as reversals and reversed charges.

columns.name: SIGN_ON_FILE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID indicating whether a hospital account signature is on file. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Appropriate Release of Information on File


Informed Consent to Release Information


Provider has Limited Ability to Release Data


On file at Payor or Plan Sponsor

columns.name: SIGN_ON_FILE_DATE
columns.description: The date the signature on file was entered for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: PRIM_CONTACT_OVRD
columns.description: The value for the primary contact override associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: CODING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coding status category ID for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


In Progress


Waiting


Completed


Ready To Start


On Hold

columns.name: CODING_STS_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user when the coding status for the hospital account last changed.

columns.name: CODING_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time that the coding status for the hospital account was last changed.

columns.name: ABSTRACT_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who last changed the abstracting status of the hospital account.

columns.name: OLD_RECUR_PRNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the parent recurring account before combine.

columns.name: CASE_MIX_GRP_CODE
columns.description: The case-mix group code associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: LAST_CMG_CODE
columns.description: The CMG code from the last CPT merge.

columns.name: LAST_INT_CVG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the last interim coverage associated with the hospital account.

columns.name: BIRTH_WEIGHT
columns.description: The birth weight of the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: GESTATIONAL_AGE
columns.description: On the mother's hospital account, the gestational age of the baby. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_WEIGHT
columns.description: The discharge weight of the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: ORGAN_DONOR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient associated with hospital account is an organ donor. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AUTOPSY_DONE_YN

columns.name: PREMATURE_BABY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the baby associated with the hospital account is premature. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AUTOPSY_DONE_YN

columns.name: CODER_INITIALS
columns.description: The initials of the user to last change the coding status on the hospital account.

columns.name: ADMIT_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the admission category ID for this hospital account. See column ADMIT_CATEGORY_C in table PAT_ENC_HSP if coding has not been performed on this hospital account. Alternatively, see V_ARHB_HSP_ACCOUNT_ADDL_INFO for the calculated value for this column based on both hospital account and encounter data. This view should be used to maintain backwards compatibility with reports created before upgrading to the Summer 2009 release.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FIRST_BILLED_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date when the account moved to the billed state for the first time.

columns.name: LAST_CODING_DATE
columns.description: The date of the last coding status change for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: EXP_TOTAL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The expected total charge amount for the hospital account.

columns.name: EXP_TOTAL_CHG_CMT
columns.description: The expected total charge user comment for the hospital account.

columns.name: EXP_PAT_LIAB_CMT
columns.description: The expected patient liability user comment for the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_IDTYPE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing DRG code set on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_IDTYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_MDC_VAL
columns.description: The Major Diagnostic Category value for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_PS_NAME
columns.description:
The severity of illness (SOI) category ID associated with the billing DRG on the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: BILL_DRG_ROM_NAME
columns.description:
The risk of mortality category ID associated with the billing DRG on the hospital account.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: BILL_DRG_PS_NAME

columns.name: BILL_DRG_SHORT_LOS
columns.description: The short length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_LONG_LOS
columns.description: The long length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_AMLOS
columns.description: The arithmetic mean length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BILL_DRG_GMLOS
columns.description: The geometric mean length of stay for the billing DRG on the hospital account.

columns.name: BASE_INV_NUM
columns.description: The base invoice number for this row.

columns.name: INV_NUM_SEQ_CTR
columns.description: The invoice number sequence counter for the hospital account.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client record.

columns.name: SPECIALTY_SVC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The specialty service category ID associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: XFER_TO_NURSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the transfer to nursing home item for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: XFER_TO_ACUTE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the transfer to acute care facility item for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DEATH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of death category ID for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: APGAR_1_MIN
columns.description: The Apgar score at one minute for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: APGAR_5_MIN
columns.description: The Apgar score at five minutes for the newborn associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: GRAVIDA
columns.description: The total number of pregnancies the patient on the hospital account has had, regardless of whether they were carried to term. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: PARA
columns.description: The number of pregnancies that the patient on the hospital account has carried until the point where the fetus is viable. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: BIRTH_CERT_SENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a birth certificate has been sent for this account. A null value for this column indicates that a birth certificate has not been sent. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN

columns.name: FAILED_VBAC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a vaginal birth after caesarian failed. This is an abstracting item.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CVG_LIST_SELECT_YN

columns.name: DELIVERY_DATE_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of the delivery associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: PRENATAL_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the prenatal physician. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: DELIVER_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the delivering physician associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: HOLD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The coding hold status category ID for the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: GEST_AGE_BABY
columns.description: The gestational age of the baby associated with the hospital account. This is an abstracting item.

columns.name: ACCT_FOLLOWUP_DT
columns.description: This column stores the self-pay follow-up date associated with this hospital account.
